TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBaseErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 作为所有运行状况监视错误事件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all the health-monitoring error events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是表示错误条件的运行状况监视事件的基类。The class is the base class for the health-monitoring events that represent error conditions. ASP.NET 使用以 Web 应用程序的生命周期内指示错误条件及其派生类型。ASP.NET uses and its derived types to indicate error conditions during the lifetime of a Web application. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，你将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例由两部分组成。The following code example has two parts. 第一种是使 ASP.NET 运行状况监视使用派生自事件的配置文件的摘录类。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use an event derived from the class. 第二部分演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The second shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` 下面的代码演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The following code shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 在实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从构造函数中调用此构造函数`SampleWebBaseErrorEvent`类，派生自的类类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor from a constructor for the `SampleWebBaseErrorEvent` class, a class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent/CS/webbaseerrorevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent/VB/webbaseerrorevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你实现一个自定义，你必须确保你的自定义错误事件可以处理此异常。If you implement a custom , you must ensure that your custom error event handles this exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 递增与性能相关的事件-错误计数器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法递增以下性能计数器：This method increments the following performance counters: - 引发的基础结构错误事件。Infrastructure Error Events Raised. 这是一个全局计数器跟踪引发的错误事件。This is a global counter that tracks the error events raised. - 引发的错误事件。Error Events Raised. 这是一个跟踪自应用程序启动以来引发的错误事件数的应用程序特定计数器。This is an application-specific counter that tracks the number of error events raised since the application started. 此方法也会调用父，引发的事件计数器时都会增加。This method also calls the parent , which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器可跟踪引发的事件的总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要查看这些性能计数器在系统监视器 (PerfMon)，在**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**中**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择你想要查看，然后单击的性能计数器**添加**按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[与 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409)在 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
